p.k: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky
62% In a world scorched by dragons, grim Christian Bale and slayer Matthew McConaughey defend their band of survivors against fire-breathing predators. Fantasy adventure
57% Cameron Diaz, Lucy Liu and Drew Barrymore star as the sexy crime-fighting trio in this frenetic action comedy based on the hit 70s TV series. With Bill Murray
69% When a secret experiment turns frail kid Chris Evans into a rippling, spandex-clad superhero, the fate of WWII rests in his all-American hands
64% Climber Sylvester Stallone is forced by John Lithgow's gang of thieves to help recover lost loot in the mountains. Action

Bruce Willis stars as a cop sent on a deadly wild goose chase as the whole city of New York is held hostage by a scheming crook. Fast-paced action with Samuel L Jackson
